title: Italian Oil Giant Eni Knew About Climate Change More Than 50 Years Ago, Report Reveals
description:
Italian oil major Eni knew of the climate impacts of fossil fuel extraction since 1970, according to a report by Greenpeace Italy and advocacy group ReCommon shared with DeSmog.

The post Italian Oil Giant Eni Knew About Climate Change More Than 50 Years Ago, Report Reveals appeared first on DeSmog.
